channel.title: [508] Combat Help.. [508]
channel.description:
In the source I just downloaded there is PvP and Bh.. Neither work. When you click "Attack" you just stand there and nothing happens. Anyone know what the problem might be? I've been looking through files like Player.java, PlayerCombat.java, BountyHunter.java and can't seem to find much on it or I just don't exactly know what I'm looking for. Any and ALL help is greatly appreciated.
If anyone could help I have: [b]TeamViewer:[/b] 228 987 374 [b]----Pass:[/b] 8cqy47 [b]MSN Messenger:[/b] Ethanbowne@yahoo.com [b]Skype:[/b] Ogreslay
